resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104253</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104253</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206843</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The North Carolina State Capitol: Pride of the State</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Nord-Carolina Zustand-Kapitol: Stolz des
Zustandes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Capitol du nord D'État de la Caroline : 
Fierté de l'état</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Capitol Do Estado De North.carolina: 
Orgulho do estado</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il North.carolina Dichiara Il Capitol: 
Orgoglio del Dichiarare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το κράτος Capitol της βόρειας Καρολίνας: 
Υπερηφάνεια του κράτους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Capitol Del Estado De Carolina del Norte: 
Orgullo del estado</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">tells the story of this state capitol -- how a committee settled on a location, how a new town (Raleigh) was laid out in 1792, and why the political temple erected in mid 1800s stands today among the finest examples of civic Greek Revival architecture in the U.S.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erklärt die Geschichte dieses Zustandkapitols -- 
wie ein Ausschuß auf einem Standort abrechnete, wie eine neue Stadt 
(Raleigh) 1792 ausgebritten wurde und warum der politische Bügel, der
in mittlerem 1800s aufgerichtet wird, heute unter den feinsten 
Beispielen der bürgerlichen griechischen Wiederbelebungarchitektur in
den US steht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">dit l'histoire de ce capitol d'état -- comment un
comité a soldé le compte sur un emplacement, comment une nouvelle 
ville (Raleigh) a été présentée en 1792, et pourquoi le temple 
politique érigé dans mi 1800s se tient aujourd'hui parmi les 
exemples les plus fins de l'architecture grecque civique de 
renaissance aux États-Unis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">diz a história deste capitol do estado -- como um
comitê se estabeleciu em uma posição, como uma cidade nova 
(Raleigh) foi colocada para fora em 1792, e porque o temple político 
erigido em 1800s mid está hoje entre os exemplos os mais finos da 
arquitetura grega civic do revival nos E. U..</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">dice alla storia di questo dichiarano il 
capitol -- come un comitato si è depositato su una posizione, come 
una nuova città (Raleigh) è stata presentata in 1792 e perchè il 
tempiale politico eretto in metà di 1800s si leva in piedi oggi fra 
gli esempi più fini di architettura greca civica di rinascita negli 
Stati Uniti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λέει την ιστορία αυτού του κρατικού capitol -- πώς
μια επιτροπή που εγκαθίσταται σε μια θέση, πώς μια νέα πόλη 
(Raleigh) σχεδιάστηκε το 1792, και γιατί ο πολιτικός ναός 
που δημιουργείται σε μέσο 1800s στέκεται σήμερα μεταξύ των 
λεπτότερων παραδειγμάτων της πολιτικής ελληνικής αρχιτεκτονικής 
αναγέννησης στις ΗΠΑ</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cuenta la historia de este capitol del estado -- 
cómo un comité colocó en una localización, cómo una ciudad nueva 
(Raleigh) fue presentada en 1792, y porqué el templo político 
erigido en 1800s mediados de está parado hoy entre los ejemplos más 
finos de la configuración griega cívica del renacimiento en los 
E.E.U.U..</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206843</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104253</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-north-carolina-state-capitol-pride-of-the-state</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
